channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Apple opens up its App Store to competition in Japan
item.description: Epic Games CEO says Fortnite won't return to Japan, though, because the new rules still require high fees.

item.title: 10 Best Protein Powders, According to 2 Years of Testing (2026)
item.description: We found the best protein powders that won’t make your shake taste like drywall.

item.title: Phone Updates Used to Be Annoying. iOS 26 Is Awful
item.description: Is the latest iPhone operating system aesthetically appealing? No. But is it useful? Also no. At least I have company among the disgruntled.

item.title: A Filmmaker Made a Sam Altman Deepfake—and Got Unexpectedly Attached

item.title: No keynotes, no BS — why this year’s best tech talks happened over cocktails at StrictlyVC
item.description: Impactful talks and connections happen at StrictlyVC. Read the full 2025 recap and join the 2026 waitlist to get access to the lowest ticket prices.

item.title: Pumped Hydro Energy Storage Is Having a Renaissance

item.title: Trump Media is merging with fusion power company TAE Technologies in $6B+ deal

item.title: Rivian rolls out new ‘Universal Hands-Free’ driving feature

item.title: Peripheral Labs taps into self-driving car sensors to bring sports fans right into the game
item.description: The startup has raised a $3.6 million seed round led by Khosla Ventures.
